name: Knife Throw 3D
description:
Knife Throw 3D is a game where you use knives to break the woods.

Game is simple, just tap to throw knife, once enough, the wood is break and you can proceed to next level. Just evade others knives to break the wood.

Game features:

-Simple gameplay

-Great 3D view

-Perfect game effects

-Smoothly experience

Thanks for playing our game! Your feedback is highly appreciated.
